job.title: Senior Data Scientist
job.description: This Jobot Job is hosted by Kat SarinasbrbrAre you a fit Easy Apply now by clicking the Apply button and sending us your resumebrbrSalary 110000  180000 per yearbrbrstrongA Bit About UsbrbrstrongWe are a growing opensource platform for launching decentralized finance applications and enterprise blockchain deployments We make it simple to launch finance applications using blockchain technologybrbrstrongbrbrstrongWhy join usbrbrbrstrongstrongThis remote role offers the opportunity to build the internet of finance We are a collaborative and supportive team who empower people to build an open simple and democratic systembrbrstrongJob DetailsbrbrstrongstrongQualificationsbrbrstrongBachelors degree in data scienceanalytics or related fieldbrbr3 years of data analytics experiencebrbrBasic knowledge on computer science principles and architecturebrbrExperience in data mining machine learning and with data visualizationbrbrExcellent organization logic and experience with the experimental methodbrbrExperience reviewing and streamlining business processes including gathering and documenting business requirements developing and implementing new processes and proceduresbrbrAbility to accurately perform complex mathematical computationsbrbrAbility to manage multiple priorities both large and complexbrbrBe able to collaborate and innovate as a means to create exceptional value for our members our company and our communitybrbrStrong analytical and problemsolving abilitiesbrbrAbility to break down and understand complex business problems define a solution and implement it using advanced quantitative methodsbrbrstrongRequired SkillsbrbrstrongPythonbrbrSQL andor NoSQL databasesbrbrRbrbrStrong communication skills with regard to analytical concepts and methodsbrbrA very high level of intellectual curiositybrbrAWS or Google CloudbrbrInterested in hearing more Easy Apply now by clicking the Apply button
